QuestData.Title: Hard Falls
QuestData.Description: Stone Dragons bow only to strength. When we have punished them enough, they will bend back to our will.$B$BI have sent many of my strongest giants onto the fields in the west. They will bring the drakes to the ground. You will see to it that they do not take wing again after they fall.
QuestData.CompletionText: Look to the dragons that have been knocked out of the sky by boulders. They will be easier targets.
QuestData.RewardText: Not just fast it seems. You have some bite in you.$B$BWell done, $c.
